summary: Complete frontend testing of Frontal Équestre Configurator with NEW images (frontal-vide.png, crystals-grid.png). All 14 tests passed (100%). Crystal positioning verified: polynomial curve with Y ranging from 26% (edges) to 63% (center) - descends at center, rises at edges. All 4 sizes work correctly: Poney (60), Cob (75), Full (85), XL (99). Mobile responsiveness verified at 375px.
passed_tests: NEW frontal-vide.png image displayed correctly with black holes visible
19 crystals displayed in grid from NEW crystals-grid.png sprite sheet
Max 5 stones selection enforced (buttons disabled after 5 selections)
Crystal positions follow polynomial curve: First stone (13%, 26.24%), Middle (50.5%, 62.7%), Last (88%, 29.98%)
Full size: 85 stones displayed - VERIFIED (default selection)
Clear all (Tout effacer) button resets selection correctly
Export modal opens with correct Shopify HTML code (2256 chars)
Copy button 'Copier le code' present and functional
Mobile responsiveness (375x844) - 2-column crystal grid, all features accessible
critical_code_review_comments: App.js well-structured with 99 hardcoded positions in ALL_POSITIONS array
Polynomial curve correctly implemented (Y from 26% to 63% at center, back to ~30% at edges)
Sprite sheet extraction logic properly calculates background-position for each crystal (1080x1080, 5x4 grid)
Crystal diameter set at 2.0% of frontal width for proper sizing
data-testid attributes implemented on all interactive elements
Responsive CSS breakpoints at 768px and 480px handle grid layout changes
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly with NEW images. Crystal positioning uses hardcoded ALL_POSITIONS array (99 positions) with polynomial curve: Y ranges from 26.24% (left edge, x=13%) to 62.75% (center, x=50%) back to 29.98% (right edge, x=88%). Sizes updated: Poney=60, Cob=75, Full=85, XL=99. Sprite sheet is crystals-grid.png (1080x1080px, 5x4 grid). Fixed price at 39€.
